title: *** 2 Bed 1 Bath TOUR TODAY at Addison Ranch***
posting_body: ['Call or stop by today to take a tour of your new apartment home!', 'Addison Ranch offers great location and quality of life.', 'Our community is nestled in a quiet neighborhood within the prestigious Petaluma School District.', 'Living at Addison Ranch, you can take in some fun at the Washington Square Shopping Center, McDowell Park, and the Lynch Creek Trail.', 'Explore the neighborhood and beyond with easy access to Highway 101 and the Petaluma Municipal Airport.', 'If you are looking for a two-bedroom apartment, Addison Ranch has the perfect home for you!', 'This unique apartment home features two large bedrooms with spacious closets and a shared bathroom just a few steps down the hall.', 'The residence has the perfect blend of designer wood-inspired flooring and carpet.', 'It also includes central heat and air conditioning so residents can be comfortable year-round.', 'Each bedroom has a bright window outfitted with dual-pane, energy-efficient windows and views of the grounds!', 'Addison Ranch is a community with an array of extra amenities for residents.', 'Lounge by one of our two shimmering swimming pools or play a round of billiards in our new Clubhouse.', 'Learn more about living in this beautiful two-bedroom apartment at Addison Ranch today!', '**Addison Ranch is a Smoke FREE Community**', '$800.00 Security Deposit', 'All sizes welcome!', ' Pets - Max 2 allowed', 'Comments:', 'Breed restrictions apply.', ' A deposit and rent charge is required for each pet.', ' The first pet is $400 deposit, the second is an additional $200.', 'Cats -  allowed, Rent $30.00, Deposit $400.00 Dogs -  allowed, Rent $30.00, Deposit $400.00', 'Experience the best of Petaluma with our\xa0luxurious lifestyle at Addison Ranch with spacious\xa0floor plans, generous gourmet kitchens, two resort-style\xa0pools and a grand\xa0state-of-the-art fitness center.', 'Addison Ranch Apartment Homes is a smoke-free community.', 'Community Amenities', 'Clubhouse with Internet Cafe and Resident Lounge • Resort Style Recreation Area • Reserved Covered Parking • Common Area Wi-fi Hotspots • State of the Art Fitness Center • Online Resident Portal •', 'Valet Front Door Refuse & Recycling Service • On-call Maintenance for Emergency Services', 'Apartment Amenities', 'Stainless Steel Appliances • Gas Range • Built-in Microwave • Washer and Dryer in Unit • Hardwood Inspired Floors with Plush Carpeting • Spacious Patio or Balcony', 'We are open 7 days a week!', 'Mon-Fri:', '9AM-6PM', 'Sat - Sun:', '9AM-6PM', 'Call for an appointment and take a tour of our community!', 'Addison Ranch Apartments', '200 Greenbriar Circle', 'Petaluma, CA 94954', 'Visit our website to fill in an application and reserve your future home in just minutes!', 'show contact info', 'Url:Apply now!', '<URL>', 'Federal law prohibits housing discrimination on the basis of race, color, national origin, religion, sex, familial status, or disability.', '* Prices and availability are subject to change without notice.']
